description:
cmd/gc: remove reference to ? and @ symbols in error message

Those symbols are only allowed during imports;
the parser may expect them but saying that doesn't help users.

Fixes issue 3434.

messages.text:
Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0d58425cdf6b ***

cmd/gc: remove reference to ? and @ symbols in error message

Those symbols are only allowed during imports;
the parser may expect them but saying that doesn't help users.

Fixes issue 3434.

CC=golang-dev
